attributes.action: Stop the use of TV License funds for Islamic prpaganda
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/newsround/21294292
Please look at the link above and sign this petition if you think the BBC should not push Islamic traditions on our children with our License fee money, especialy using a childrens news program to promote the issue. I would like the government to stop using funds from the TV License in this way or abolish the license compleatly.
